title: x/mobile gomobile can not build anything for ios.
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
1.6.3


2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
darwin, amd64


3. What did you do?
Any gomobile code i try to build for ndroid works, and nevr for ios.

````
x-MacBook-Pro:piano apple$ gomobile build --target=ios
gomobile: xcrun xcodebuild -configuration Release -project /var/folders/wp/ff6sz9qs6g71jnm12nj2kbyw0000gp/T/gomobile-work-688869556/main.xcodeproj failed: exit status 65
=== BUILD TARGET main OF PROJECT main WITH CONFIGURATION Release ===

Check dependencies
Code Sign error: No provisioning profiles found: No nonâ€“expired provisioning profiles were found.

** BUILD FAILED **


The following build commands failed:
	Check dependencies
(1 failure)



````

4. What did you expect to see?

a build :)

5. What did you see instead?

it telling me to check dependencies.
I get this for ANY gomobile build --target=ios
